name: 1Call Direct
tagline: We are a Top of the League sales outsourcer.
description: Established in 1988 in London as Hotlines Telemarketing Ltd, the Glasgow branch (which was established in June 2000) rebranded as 1Call Direct in October 2003.  We are a “Top of the League” acquisition / sales outsourcer that exceeds customer targets, reduces risk and drives exceptional return on investment for clients in many sectors.
